Alluvial Plot

alluvialClass.Rd

This tool will help you form Alluvial Diagrams (Alluvial Plots).

Value

Alluvial Plot

Super classes

jmvcore::Analysis -> ClinicoPathDescriptives::alluvialBase -> alluvialClass

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

alluvialClass$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
